name: audit-log-query-request
description: Request message for querying audit log records with specified parameters and range.

fields.name: audit-log
fields.description: The object identifier of the audit log to query.

fields.name: query-parameters
fields.description: The parameters defining which records to retrieve.

fields.name: start-at-sequence-number
fields.description: The sequence number at which to start retrieving records.

fields.name: requested-count
fields.description: The maximum number of records to return.
